"SkySpike": A high-flying game that combines elements of volleyball and ultimate frisbee. Players wear specialized jetpacks and play on a court that's raised several feet off the ground. The objective is to score points by throwing a spiked ball over the net and into the opposing team's goal, all while avoiding obstacles and other players.

"BubbleBall": A sport where players wear inflatable bubbles and try to score goals while bouncing off each other. The bubbles are equipped with handles and players can use them to push, pull, or tackle their opponents. The game is played on a court that's divided into two halves by a centerline, and the objective is to score by getting the ball into the opposing team's half of the court.

"AquaJoust": A game where players wear helmets with aqua-filled tanks and try to knock each other off a floating platform using inflatable poles. The platform is suspended over a body of water and players must balance and maneuver to avoid falling in. The objective is to score by pushing the opposing team off the platform and into the water.

"Zipline Soccer": A sport where players wear specialized harnesses and zip-lines across a field to try and score goals. The field is divided into two halves by a centerline, and players can only cross the centerline by zipping across a series of zip-lines that are suspended high above the ground. The objective is to score by getting the ball into the opposing team's half of the field.

"RockClimb Rugby": A game where players wear specialized climbing shoes and try to score by carrying a ball up a vertical rock wall. The wall is divided into two halves by a centerline, and players can only cross the centerline by climbing up the wall. The objective is to score by getting the ball into the opposing team's half of the wall.
